commit.message:
Aks migration prep (#2183)

* Upgrade node version and use smaller docker image

* Update github actions node version

* Upgrade app-insights

* Fix integration tests build

* Fix invalid key format causing exception

* Add appinsights native dep

* Fix vulnerabilities reported by yarn audit

* Disable nyc cache

Due to race condition with tests running at the same time docker is
building

This sometimes causes:
No such file or directory: './node_modules/.cache/nyc/exceptionalCircumstances-a8eb56a2ce4c9ff7d962ffb015a3539ee4d28447114f33b327ee48a8dd9210b6.ts.2163749956'

for some reason I'm constantly hitting this right now.

* Chart fixes

* Trigger new build

* Bump feature toggle api version

* Remove resolution and bump web chat now it's fixed

Co-authored-by: dharmendra kumar <dharmendra.kumar@hmcts.net>

building

This sometimes causes:
No such file or directory: './node_modules/.cache/nyc/exceptionalCircumstances-a8eb56a2ce4c9ff7d962ffb015a3539ee4d28447114f33b327ee48a8dd9210b6.ts.2163749956'
